name: innovation

C1 [ C ] a new idea or method: Another innovation for the Olympics was sprint suits for runners. Technological innovations have allowed for drilling with less disturbance to the environment. the latest innovations in computer technology
[ U ] the creating and use of new ideas or methods: He says he wants to stimulate creativity and innovation. Business leaders are blaming high taxes for stifling economic success and innovation.
More examplesFewer examplesInnovations in design are making artificial limbs more like human arms and legs.Innovations are suppressed in times of geopolitical and economic stress.How can the industry foster innovation?The rate of product innovation in many industries declined significantly.
